title: 'Congratulations, world!' USIP now named after Trump. What else may be?
shortDescription: The State Department named the Peace Institute after Donald Trump. Bills have also suggested naming Dulles airport, DC train and $100 bills after him.

title: Why peace talks over Russia’s war in Ukraine remain stalled | The Excerpt
shortDescription: Trump’s peace plan meets resistance as Ukraine, Russia and Europe weigh the latest proposal.

title: Trump’s name added to Institute of Peace
shortDescription: The State Department announced the 41-year-old Institute of Peace was renamed after President Donald Trump.

title: Tennessee race prompts calls inside the GOP to 'sharpen' messaging
shortDescription: A Republican’s single-digit win in Tennessee already has GOP lawmakers talking about shifting their political strategy in next year's midterms.

title: US Institute of Peace named after Trump
shortDescription: Republican lawmakers have proposed numerous bills and resolutions that would honor Trump or feature his image over the past two years.

title: President Trump reacts to Jack Smith subpoena
shortDescription: In a statement, Smith's lawyer said his client offered to voluntarily answer lawmakers' questions about his investigations at a public hearing.

title: Trump admin could withhold some SNAP funds from these blue states. Here's why.
shortDescription: Trump's agriculture secretary said the government will withhold SNAP management funds from certain "blue states" that refuse to share sensitive recipient data.

title: GOP-led House committee subpoenas Trump prosecutor Jack Smith
shortDescription: A House committee issued a subpoena Dec. 3 to ex-special counsel Jack Smith to testify about his prosecutions against now-President Donald Trump.

title: In religiously diverse NYC, Mamdani has a First Amendment challenge
shortDescription: Mamdani's response to a protest outside a synagogue stoked criticism and highlighted the challenge of protecting civil rights while maintaining safety.

title: Trump rolls back fuel efficiency standards
shortDescription: President Donald Trump announced he'll roll back Biden-era fuel economy standards, saying the change will save Americans money.

title: More GOP infighting as key Trump ally attacks Speaker Johnson
shortDescription: Elise Stefanik, a GOP candidate for New York governor, told the Wall Street Journal that House Republicans have underperformed under Mike Johnson.

title: Embattled lawmaker to run for reelection after Trump pardon
shortDescription: Trump issued a pardon for Cuellar, who was indicted on counts of bribery, conspiracy and money laundering.

title: Trump resets fuel economy standards for vehicles
shortDescription: Signed into law in 1975, the Corporate Average Fuel Economy (CAFE) standards regulate how far vehicles must travel on a gallon of fuel.

title: ¿Cómo funcionan las Cuentas Trump? Ahorro infantil comienza con $1,000
shortDescription: Las Cuentas Trump ofrecen $1,000 por bebé nacido entre 2025 y 2028, más $250 extra. Descubre cómo funcionan, cómo reclamarlas y si convienen.

title: Trump administration pauses immigration applications for 19 nations
shortDescription: President Donald Trump's administration has paused immigration applications from 19 countries after two National Guard members were shot on Nov. 26.

title: Key takeaways as Dems overperform in red Tennessee race despite loss
shortDescription: While Republicans can breathe a sigh of relief for averting a disaster, Tennessee's 7th congressional election provided warnings signs for 2026.

title: Tariff dividend checks discussed by Trump during cabinet meeting
shortDescription: President Donald Trump discusses tariff dividend checks during a cabinet meeting.
